name: Amazing Santa Racing Skateboard Game
description:
It's the most wonderful time of the year! Why? Because Santa is gonna rock your season with this amazing skateboard game!

It's that time of the year when you have nothing else to do but relax, enjoy and spend a happy time playing Amazing Santa Racing Skateboard Game. Sit back and enjoy the game with your friends as Santa do some moves and skate his way to the finish line!

How to Play the Game:
> Tap your screen and race all the way
> Gain and maintain your speed
> Do the skate moves!

Game Features:
> Christmas treat game
> Cool gameplay
> Amazing graphics and navigation
